content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #247

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 41

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: FHIR Resource Access
Type: A-Q :question:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

The CDS Service is able to use the EHR's FHIR server to obtain any FHIR resources it requires beyond those provided by the EHR as prefetched data.

Comment:
This is optional, only when FHIR URL is provided in calling CDS Service request.

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will update the "FHIR Resource Access" section to clarify that if a fhirAuthorization field is sent by the EHR, it can be used to access data from the given FHIR server.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #247

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 41

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: FHIR Resource Access
Type: A-Q :question:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

The CDS Service is able to use the EHR's FHIR server to obtain any FHIR resources it requires beyond those provided by the EHR as prefetched data.

This is optional, only when FHIR URL is provided in calling CDS Service request.

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will update the "FHIR Resource Access" section to clarify that if a fhirAuthorization field is sent by the EHR, it can be used to access data from the given FHIR server.

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #247

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will update the "FHIR Resource Access" section to clarify that if a fhirAuthorization field is sent by the EHR, it can be used to access data from the given FHIR server.

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #247

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
We will update the "FHIR Resource Access" section to clarify that if a fhirAuthorization field is sent by the EHR, it can be used to access data from the given FHIR server.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
